1408090.name: The Office Type
1408090.description:
PLEASE NOTE THE CURRENT ISSUES BELOW! We're encountering some unexpected bugs and missing content, thank you for your patience! We'll be sending periodic patches over the next few weeks.

The Office Type is an office-themed comedy dating simulator with a wide variety of characters to learn about and narratives to explore. Take each character on dates around the city, learn their interests, answer questions, and gain their affection through match-three puzzle gameplay. Try the demo and buy the full game!

Known Issues List:

Issues will be removed from this list as patches are available. Save often and check for updates regularly!

  • Three characters’ storylines currently have some placeholder dates while we work out pipeline issues: Antonella (Date 23 onward), Toni (Date 11 onward), and Beatrice (Date 9 onward). Please avoid these characters for now, we’re sorry for the inconvenience!

  • Some characters are missing pose, expression, and voice assignments.

  • Hura’s hijab is sometimes used during minigame moments where it doesn’t match the rest of the date.

  • The Load button sometimes requires additional clicks to activate. This may also require you to load a different file first.

  • Suspected issue in Mahab’s story. Please report any problems encountered.

Add Love to your Résumé!

  • Select eight people into your office dating roster from a cast of 24 unique characters!

  • Focus on more than one character at a time, pursuing friendships, relationships, or something more casual.

  • Grow your relationships through deep storylines with multiple-choice decisions!

  • Impress your date with big combos in our match-3+ sticky note puzzle gameplay.

  • Explore dozens of locations around the city while on your breaks from CompCorp!
